Maybe you should consider to put "Russian language" in the torrent name!?
read the description before downloading. "The Light (2012) PC [RUS]" "Made by russian programmer"

This seems to be a fairly simple to understand game; I'm English speaking only, buy I realized I don't need to know Russian to play it, ie: a locked door needs a key to open it, so find the key. Character audio is in English though. To enter or exit the game press P; to use the torch, press F, you should figure this game out pretty quickly. Thanks for the upload azaq318, +1 worthy, cheers.
the title should have RUS in it. Plus just because it's made my a russian programmer doesn't mean it has an english option.
